description:
Show Linux Process information as captured by 
 https://github.com/ncabatoff/process-exporter  designed for PMM

panels.title: Top processes by Total CPU cores used
Top processes by Total CPU cores used

panels.description: Memory Used by Processes, counted as Resident Memory + Space used in Swap Space

targets.expr: topk(5, avg_over_time(namedprocess_namegroup_memory_bytes{instance="$instance", groupname=~"$groupname", memtype="swapped"}[$__interval]) + ignoring(memtype) avg_over_time(namedprocess_namegroup_memory_bytes{instance="$instance", groupname=~"$groupname", memtype="resident"}[$__interval]))

panels.title: Top processes by Used  memory[swapped,resident]
Top processes by number of  processes instances
Top processes by number of  processes instances
Top Processes by Voluntary Context Switches
Top Processes by Voluntary Context Switches
Top processes by Open File Descriptors
Top processes by File Descriptor Usage Percent
Top processes by Major Page Faults
Top processes by Minor Page Faults
Top of processes waiting on IO

title: System Processes Metrics
